main event: An object described as a round, white, luminous object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter was observed to hover, emit a pulsating light, and then depart at a high rate of speed. The object was sighted by 2 Air Force police officers and a civilian security guard on duty at Sheppard AFB, Wichita Falls, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed to hover and emit a pulsating light.
The object departed at a high rate of speed.
The object was sighted by multiple witnesses - 2 Air Force police officers and a civilian security guard.
The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
Physical evidence was reported, but the nature of the evidence is not specified.
sighted object: round, white, luminous object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter
witnesses: 2 Air Force police officers and a civilian security guard
